mapper.select: SELECT f.id AS id, f.file_name AS file_name, f.file_uuid AS file_uuid, f.file_path AS file_path, f.file_size AS file_size, f.file_type AS file_type, f.file_url AS file_url, f.description AS description, f.uploader_id AS uploader_id, f.upload_time AS upload_time, f.business_type AS business_type, f.business_id AS business_id, f.file_owner_id AS file_owner_id, f.file_status AS file_status FROM file f WHERE f.file_status = 1 AND f.business_type = '报告' AND f.business_id = #{reportId}
